activities: Our Clients in the United Kingdom provide us with personal information, which may include health information, in connect with the licensed use of our products and services pursuant to the terms of the Services Agreements we enter into with each client.  The information provided to us in accordance with the rules and regulations promulgated by the National Heath System in the United Kingdom.  Our ability to use the  information collected through our services is limited to the purpose of providing the services  as set forth in the services agreement.  We may also collect personal information (name, email address and phone number) from individuals who visit our website for the purpose of engaging in certain activities or receiving requested materials.  We may use this information for marketing purposes.  We also collect personal information from our employees and job applicants.
